metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2222 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: This was deemed not a security vulnerability by upstream.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. 0xnishit> DWARF-5 introduces(37833b96) lunar release onwards. `use_dir_and_file_0` field was not there in previous releases.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
